text: Lucas Schoofs (born 3 January 1997) is a Belgian footballer plays as a defending midfielder for Heracles Almelo. He began his career in the youth teams of Lommel United in 2014. ==Career== Schoofs was educated at then- Belgian Second Division side Lommel United, in which he went through the youth teams. On 27 April 2014, he was selected for the last game of the 2013–14 season against Sint-Truiden and made his official, substituting Thomas Jutten in the 78th minute. In the 2014–15 season, he was included into the selection. Schoofs scored his first goal on 30 August 2014 against Roeselare. On 29 August 2015, Schoofs was transferred to the national champions K.A.A. Gent.
